title: TFE continues push into Europe with two new Adina hotels
text:
"As consumers increasingly value meaningful travel experiences that cater to their specific goals of that moment, we are going to see the hospitality industry continue to grow and evolve in exciting ways," Mr Ritch said.

The Adina in Vienna will be one of only seven hotels with a swimming pool in the historic centre.

"Not only is Vienna recognised as having one of the highest ratings for quality of life worldwide, but the high-end segment of the hotel apartment market in Austria is still relatively untapped," Mr Ritch said.

Part of the rapidly developing Quartier de L’Etang development, the Adina Apartment Hotel Geneva will have 140 one-bedroom, two-bedroom and studio apartment-style hotel rooms with views of the alps.

In contrast to Vienna, Geneva will be set on an 11-hectare lifestyle precinct.

The Vibe Darling Harbour will open on October 17. Supplied

Darling Harbour vibes

Closer to home, TFE has confirmed it would officially open its newest Sydney hotel in Darling Harbour on October 17 as it cements Vibe as a lifestyle brand.

Advertisement

The 16-storey, 145-room new-build hotel is the fourth Sydney Vibe for the group and is owned by Sydney developer Icon Oceania, which is currently considering a sale of the property with the Vibe brand.

The Manhattan-meets-Sydney property will lead the way in a series of other Australian openings including Hobart, Melbourne and Adelaide.

With no signs of a slowdown in international travel, the demand for hotel rooms will remain steady, Mr Ritch says.

"But in saying that, the markets are changing. It’s no longer good enough to look at Sydney CBD as one big market, instead we must look at it as a series of micromarkets – each dynamic and unique," he said.

"When we open hotels, we deep-dive into these micromarkets to ensure our teams understand the location specific experience for our guests, and deliver a hotel that enables this."
description: The European hotels are two of the 26 new properties TFE Hotels is set to open in the next three years, with a new Sydney Vibe hotel also set to open.
